ComicInfo.Penciller: Earl Geier,Stefano Gaudiano,Steve Pugh,Earl Geier,Steve Pugh,Stefano Gaudiano
ComicInfo.Summary: This issue we present the second chapters to the three new stories begun in last month's issue. The world's only zombie detective continues his Christmas adventure in Downtown, which is written by Ian Edgington and illustrated by Steve (Grimjack) Pugh. Written by Stephen Csutoras and illustrated by Stefano (Kafka) Gaudiano, the mysterious Harlequin furthers his search for the missing body of his dead lover. This issue is rounded out with the continuation of an all-new Homicide tale which is written by John (Terminator) Arcudi and illustrated by Tim (The Spectre) Gula, and features a beautiful a beautiful four-color cover also by Gula.
ComicInfo.Title: Restless Sleep; A Nightmare on Elf Street! Part 2; Harlequin Act II
ComicInfo.Writer: Ian Edginton,John Arcudi,Stephen Csutoras,John Arcudi,Ian Edginton,Stephen Csutoras
